intro.heading: About
intro.lead_long: Surrounded by the beautiful nature of Nikko, we blend traditional Japanese flavors with modern service to bring you a special takoyaki experience.

lantern.title: Traditional Red Lanterns
lantern.desc: Red lanterns line the entrance, creating an authentic Japanese atmosphere. At night they glow warmly, welcoming every guest.

music.title: Relaxing Music
music.desc: Traditional Japanese music plays in the store, letting you enjoy your meal in a calm, soothing space.

terrace.title: Open Terrace
terrace.desc: Feel the fresh air and sunshine on our open terrace while enjoying the beauty of Nikko through the seasons.

multilingual.title: Multilingual Friendly
multilingual.desc: English menus are available so visitors from overseas can order with confidence.

payment.title: Multiple Payment Options
payment.desc: Cash, credit cards, e-money and QR payments are available for your convenience.

craftsmanship.title: Craftsmanship
craftsmanship.desc: Each takoyaki is carefully cooked by skilled artisans to achieve authentic flavor.

atmosphere.heading: Where Tradition Meets Today
atmosphere.body: Nikko is known for its rich history and World Heritage sites. We cherish that traditional atmosphere while offering services that suit modern needs. Relax, unwind, and enjoy authentic takoyaki in a comfortable space.

menu.heading: Menu
menu.lead_long: Enjoy authentic takoyaki made with fresh local ingredients and craftsmanship.

featured.name: Nikko Special Takoyaki
featured.description: Our signature takoyaki made with fresh ingredients from Nikko. Seasoned with our secret tare and special sauce, it’s crispy on the outside and fluffy inside.

more.lead: We offer many other items as well.

access.heading: Access & Store Info
access.lead:
We’re located within easy reach of Nikko’s popular sights.
Feel free to drop by.
